name: Bison Agency
description:
Bison Agency provides high quality software development services in eCommerce. Since 2014 we have created hundreds of digital applications and successfully completed over 70 projects for our customers from all over the world.
Our team consists of 20+ very passionate and experienced individuals specializing in creating professional web-based, mobile-based and blockchain-based solutions. We can help you with transforming your online presence by providing a modern, user-friendly experience for your clients.
We currently work in the fields of e-commerce development, web software solutions, IT project management, mobile app development, and blockchain. We specialize in Magento, WooCommerce, Shopify, AngularJS, React, Symfony, Laravel, PrestaShop, Etherum, and Solidity.
